title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: Open/Close project options are not always available in the Navigator.
EB: Open/Close project options should always be available in the Navigator.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Create two projects, P1 and P2. Select project P2 and close it using the Navigator options.
